posts.title: Modern and Futuristic Landing Page Design for arenpro.com
posts.excerpt: The landing page design for arenpro.com is sleek, modern, and futuristic
posts.content:
The landing page design for arenpro.com is sleek, modern, and futuristic. We have utilized a dark color scheme with accents of blue and green to create a visually stunning experience reminiscent of HUD graphics. The combination of dark and bright colors gives the landing page a high-tech and cutting-edge feel, perfectly reflecting the innovative nature of our online platform.

The layout of the landing page is clean and intuitive, guiding visitors through key information about our services and offerings. The use of bold typography and striking visuals helps to grab the attention of users and keep them engaged as they explore the site.

One of the main goals of the landing page design was to bring the essence of our online platform to life. By incorporating elements of technology and modernity, we aimed to create a seamless transition from the landing page to the full website experience. This cohesive design approach ensures that visitors feel immersed in the world of arenpro.com from the moment they arrive on the site.

Overall, the landing page design for arenpro.com is a visually captivating and user-friendly introduction to our online platform. With its dark color scheme, futuristic elements, and intuitive layout, the landing page sets the stage for an engaging and memorable user experience.

contents.title: Info
contents.content: The landing page design for arenpro.com is sleek, modern, and futuristic. We have utilized a dark color scheme with accents of blue and green to create a visually stunning experience reminiscent of HUD graphics.

posts.title: Digikala’s AI & Machine Learning Server
posts.excerpt: Imagine that Digikala is about to launch its own artificial intelligence (AI) system. This project (which is a case study and has no client) is a professional dashboard for displaying Digikala's AI KPIs.
posts.content:
Introduction

Unveiling the Future of E-commerce; Our Quantum Leap for Digikala's Dashboard
pen_spark

Imagine that Digikala is about to launch its own artificial intelligence (AI) system. This project (which is a case study and has no client) is a professional dashboard for displaying Digikala's AI KPIs. The project involves creating a complex visual form that uses charts, numbers, and dynamic diagrams to showcase the workload and performance of Digikala's AI core. The visualization becomes more complex as the load and usage increase.

Challenge

A Quantum Leap Forward

This wasn't just about a facelift; it was about a paradigm shift. Digikala, a pioneer in its field, deserved a dashboard that mirrored its forward-thinking approach. We needed to create a platform that harnessed the power of quantum computing (an experimental project, mind you) to deliver unparalleled insights and functionalities.

Creative & Unique Design

A Dashboard Reimagined

We shattered the mold and stepped into the future. Gone were the predictable layouts and overwhelming data displays. Instead, we crafted a dashboard that felt like a portal to a new dimension – a testament to Digikala's cutting-edge approach. The design, inspired by the principles of quantum mechanics, was as visually stunning as it was functional. Interactive elements danced across the screen, presenting data in a way that was both intuitive and awe-inspiring.

Concept

The Power of Quantum at Your Fingertips

This wasn't just a design exercise. We integrated the principles of quantum computing into the very core of the dashboard. Imagine a platform that analyzes data with unprecedented speed and accuracy, providing Digikala with real-time insights into customer behavior, market trends, and sales performance. This groundbreaking integration empowered Digikala to make data-driven decisions at the speed of light.

Conclusion

E-commerce Evolved

Digikala's new quantum-powered dashboard is a glimpse into the future of e-commerce. It's a testament to the power of pushing boundaries and embracing the unknown. This isn't just a dashboard; it's a command center for a digital empire, empowering Digikala to reign supreme in the ever-evolving online marketplace.

The Result:

This isn't just a website with a shiny coat of paint. We meticulously optimized the platform for speed and usability. It's now an e-commerce powerhouse, allowing customers to browse, compare, and even purchase their dream car with effortless ease. Every click, scroll, and animation is designed to evoke a sense of luxury and exclusivity, leaving a lasting impression on potential buyers long after they leave the virtual showroom.

posts.title: Pakshoma Online Brand-Book
posts.excerpt: Dokmeh Agency has developed a modern, interactive landing page for Pakshoma’s new brand book as part of its rebranding initiative
posts.content:
Pakshoma Brand Book Landing Page – An Interactive Brand Identity Experience

Dokmeh Agency is proud to have designed and developed a dedicated landing page for Pakshoma’s new brand book as part of the company’s rebranding initiative. This interactive platform provides users with a structured and user-friendly access to all elements and assets of Pakshoma’s brand identity.

With a modern design and a dynamic user interface, this landing page has been developed to enable users to easily navigate through Pakshoma’s visual standards, verbal identity, logo design principles, color palette, typography, photography style, and other brand book elements.

This project is designed with a focus on interactivity and accessibility, allowing Pakshoma’s internal teams and business partners to access up-to-date brand identity guidelines seamlessly and efficiently.

Key Features of Pakshoma’s Brand Book Landing Page

✅ Interactive design for easy and practical access
✅ Structured categorization of branding standards
✅ Automated updates to reflect the latest brand book changes
✅ Modern and user-friendly interface for a seamless experience

By launching this landing page, Dokmeh Agency has taken a pioneering step in digitalizing corporate brand books, ensuring Pakshoma’s brand identity is consistently and accurately applied across all digital and physical touchpoints.

contents.title: Info
contents.content: Dokmeh Agency has developed a modern, interactive landing page for Pakshoma’s new brand book as part of its rebranding initiative. This platform provides structured access to all branding elements, including visual standards, verbal identity, logo guidelines, color palette, typography, and photography style. Designed for easy navigation and real-time updates, it ensures Pakshoma’s internal teams and partners can access the latest brand identity guidelines effortlessly. With a user-friendly interface and automated updates, this landing page sets a new standard in digital brand book management, ensuring consistency across all touchpoints.

posts.title: Dorsa + Swarovski Landing page [Case Study]
posts.excerpt: Dorsa + Swarovski: A Heartbeat of Exquisite DesignThis combination forms the core concept of this research-driven projec
posts.content:
Introduction

Unveiling Brilliance:A Diamond-Cut Landing Page for Darsa's Finest

Darsa, a brand synonymous with timeless elegance and quality, sought to illuminate a new facet of their offerings – a collection of truly exceptional leather goods, clothing, and home appliances. However, their existing landing pages lacked the sparkle needed to truly showcase these exquisite pieces.

Challenge

A Landing Page Redefined

This wasn't just about announcing new products; it was about crafting a digital experience that mirrored the brilliance of a diamond. Darsa's offerings deserved a platform that transcended the ordinary – a landing page that dazzled like a facet in the sunlight.

Diamond Concept

Inspired by Light & Luxury

We drew inspiration from the captivating nature of diamonds. Gone were the flat layouts and generic visuals. Instead, we crafted a landing page that shimmered with creative brilliance. Interactive elements, like subtle light refractions, danced across the screen, highlighting Darsa's exquisite products. High-quality, dynamic product photography captured the richness of the leather, the drape of the clothing, and the sleek lines of the homeware, each showcased like a precious gem.

Creative Design

Beyond the Sparkle

But the brilliance wasn't just visual. We meticulously crafted the copywriting, using language as polished as Darsa's finest leather. Each product description became a captivating story, enticing visitors to explore the depths of Darsa's craftsmanship.

Conclusion

A Gateway to Excellence

Darsa's diamond-inspired landing page is a testament to the power of pushing design boundaries. It's a platform that captivates the senses, ignites curiosity, and ultimately, compels users to explore the world of luxury that awaits them. This isn't just a landing page; it's a portal to a dazzling display of Darsa's finest, waiting to be discovered and treasured.

contents.title: Info
contents.content: Dorsa + Swarovski: A Heartbeat of Exquisite DesignThis combination forms the core concept of this research-driven project.Vibrant orange typography pulses with energy, while a gemstone heart encases a captivating interlocking ring. The beloved Dal line art playfully covers a portion of the design, creating a captivating all-or-nothing aesthetic.This conceptual design was envisioned for Deresa's landing page in collaboration with Swarovski.

posts.title: Mivinna
posts.excerpt: Mivinna, a brand synonymous with timeless elegance, approached us with a challenge: their existing website simply didn't reflect the premium quality and artistry of their bridal gowns.
posts.content:
Unveiling the New Mivinna: Where Luxury Meets Digital Experience

We transformed Mivinna's e-commerce presence from basic to breathtaking.

Mivinna, a brand synonymous with timeless elegance, approached us with a challenge: their existing website simply didn't reflect the premium quality and artistry of their bridal gowns. It was a flat, low-resolution experience that failed to capture the magic of their designs.

CHALLENGE

Storytelling:

Mivinna, a brand synonymous with timeless elegance, approached us with a challenge: their existing website simply didn't reflect the premium quality and artistry of their bridal gowns. It was a flat, low-resolution experience that failed to capture the magic of their designs.

NEXT STEP

Understanding the User Experience (UX):

Knowing Mivinna caters to discerning brides seeking a luxurious experience, we conducted a deep UX dive. We needed a website that not only showcased the gowns beautifully but also made the entire journey, from browsing to purchase, seamless and delightful.

ART DIRECTION

Crafting a Digital Masterpiece:

Gone are the days of dark backgrounds and cluttered layouts. We embraced a soft, premium pink as the canvas, allowing Mivinna's breathtaking gowns to take center stage. Clean lines, minimalist design, and generous white space guide the user's eye with ease.

NEXT STEP

Understanding the User Experience (UX):

Knowing Mivinna caters to discerning brides seeking a luxurious experience, we conducted a deep UX dive. We needed a website that not only showcased the gowns beautifully but also made the entire journey, from browsing to purchase, seamless and delightful.

THE CONCEPT

Visual Storytelling Through Video:

Sometimes, words simply can't do justice to the intricate details and exquisite craftsmanship of a Mivinna gown. That's where our strategically placed, bite-sized (5-second) videos come in. These short bursts of visual storytelling allow brides to appreciate the finer details without bogging down the experience.pen_spark

The Result:

The new Mivinna website is more than just a digital storefront; it's an immersive brand experience that reflects the elegance and sophistication of their gowns. Brides can now explore, discover, and fall in love with their dream dress in a way that befits the Mivinna brand.

You can experience this project here

www.mivinna.com

posts.title: Nextoffice – Alireza Taghaboni
posts.excerpt: Next Office, founded by Alireza Taghaboni, aims to provide a contemporary alternative to traditional Iranian architecture, responding to each project's climate state and economic, socio-political, and cultural context.
posts.content: This website won the CSS Design Awards (CSSDA) in 2017.

contents.title: Website Concept: Alireza Taghbani Architectural Office
contents.content:
During our initial introduction to NextOffice projects, presented to us by Alireza Taghboni at NextOffice, we were struck by a compelling thread that ran through them all.

Alireza Taghboni enlightened us about his ingenious use of the “crack” element as a structural feature, both internally and externally, in his architectural designs. Throughout his projects, we observed the recurring presence of these cracks, each playing a distinct role in shaping the overall form and functionality of the spaces they inhabit.

contents.title: Inspired by the Crack Element, We Embraced a Fractured Website Structure
contents.content:
Drawing inspiration from the intriguing concept of the “crack element” in Alireza Taghboni’s (nextoffice)architectural designs, we embarked on a journey to infuse this notion into the very fabric of our website’s structure. Inspired by the transformative power of cracks, we envisioned a website that seamlessly blended the boundaries between content and navigation, creating a dynamic and engaging user experience.

this website has developed since 2017 by Behrouz Tahanzadeh

posts.title: Kaamsara Brand Design
posts.excerpt: This thin boundary begins with a gap – a half-open door 🚪. This door promises warmth, coffee, and tranquility.

contents.title: OVERVIEW
contents.content:
KamSara is a combination of the words “Kam” and “Caravanserai”. 🐫

The word Caravanserai evokes for me the tales of One Thousand and One Nights. It represents a distinct boundary between the dark, scary desert and a warm caravanserai filled with golden lights, festivities, and joy.

This thin boundary begins with a gap – a half-open door 🚪. This door promises warmth, coffee, and tranquility.
Through the use of negative space, this logo attempts to convey deep meaning with minimal lines.
In the heart of the desert, where the silvery moon 🌛 🌬️ was the only guiding light, a weary shadow moved forward. The sound of caravan bells had faded into the night’s silence, and only the wind whispered in their ears. Suddenly, at the bend of a sand dune, a strange shape appeared in the darkness – an ancient door with mysterious patterns, from whose cracks emanated a warm and mysterious light. It was as if a gateway to another world had opened in the heart of darkness.

posts.title: Roma
posts.excerpt: Timeless backdrops, natural light, and authentic moments—Milan is the perfect city for stunning portraits.

contents.title: PROCESS
contents.content:
I scouted locations around Brera, Navigli, and Piazza del Duomo to find diverse backdrops with authentic Milanese character. The shoot took place over a single day, using mostly natural light with a minimal gear setup (Sony A7III + 50mm f/1.4).
Post-processing focused on preserving the warmth of the environment and the subtle details in skin tone and texture — aiming for an organic, film-like finish.

posts.title: Parsian Lotus Investment Bank.
posts.excerpt: Timeless backdrops, natural light, and authentic moments—Milan is the perfect city for stunning portraits.

contents.title: OVERVIEW
contents.content: Milan Portrait is a lifestyle photography series captured in the heart of Milan — a city where timeless architecture meets modern elegance. The series focuses on portraying the natural charm and individuality of the subject, set against the soft textures of historic streets, urban cafés, and golden afternoon light.

contents.title: CREATIVE DIRECTION
contents.content: Milan Portrait is a lifestyle photography series captured in the heart of Milan — a city where timeless architecture meets modern elegance. The series focuses on portraying the natural charm and individuality of the subject, set against the soft textures of historic streets, urban cafés, and golden afternoon light.

contents.title: PROCESS
contents.content:
I scouted locations around Brera, Navigli, and Piazza del Duomo to find diverse backdrops with authentic Milanese character. The shoot took place over a single day, using mostly natural light with a minimal gear setup (Sony A7III + 50mm f/1.4).
Post-processing focused on preserving the warmth of the environment and the subtle details in skin tone and texture — aiming for an organic, film-like finish.

posts.title: Pakshoma
posts.excerpt: The Pakshoma project is a masterpiece in two aspects: innovative and modern design alongside a strong technical infrastructure. The Pakshoma website is unlike any of the previous projects by Dakmeh Agency

contents.title: The Story of Dastan
contents.content: The Pakshoma project is a masterpiece in two aspects: innovative and modern design alongside a strong technical infrastructure. The Pakshoma website is unlike any of the previous projects by Dakmeh Agency. This time, we were dealing with a fully equipped sales tool that had to persuade a wide range of audiences to explore and search. It has succeeded, and the project effectively meets the needs of the brand’s audience as well as the Pakshoma marketing team.

contents.title: Key Features of the User Interface Design
contents.content:
Dropdown menus with frosted glass backgrounds
Use of smooth animations
Implementation of large images with sharp color contrasts
Creation of a unique design system
We aimed to design the user interface as a dashboard. Our vision was to make the website’s UI feel like an interactive experience with modern home appliances, rather than just a typical e-commerce platform. Essentially, the way users engage with the website is more akin to a technological tool rather than a conventional online store.

contents.title: Design and Development Process
contents.content:
Design and Development Process
The initial design phase took approximately 20 days. Our goal was to present the best possible ideas for this project; we aimed to make the design both practical and innovative. We entered the meeting with about seven different design proposals. The result?
The very first design was approved. They found the concepts highly satisfying—so much so that, in the middle of the meeting, the CEO stood up and said:
“This is it. Let’s move forward with this design.”
